title: Miraflex New Baby 1 Kids Eye Glass Frames, 39/14, Age 3-6 (Navy Blue)
description: Miraflex Glasses are made of lightweight material that adapts to your childâ€™s facial structure. We use no metal parts, screws, pads, or hinges. That means Miraflex glasses never crack or break, and require no adjustments or replace parts. Our frames are all made in Italy and are BPA free, rubber free, latex free, & hypo-allergenic. Because our frames were constructed with infants and children in mind, Miraflex frames are built with an anatomically designed bridge that holds them in place without the need for nose pads. All Miraflex frames come with a matching adjustable elastic band that wraps behind the head and assures the frames stay secured properly on the face. Miraflex frames can hold up to a +/- 28 lens prescription and are available in many colors, styles, and shapes for boys and girls.
